title: Manage My Day – AI Productivity App
details: Building a full-scale productivity app from scratch — managing tasks, projects, goals, and daily activities across multiple life pillars like work, fitness, cooking, and family.
Designed and implemented a **custom smart calendar** built on top of SF Calendar with drag & drop, event resizing, recurrence, and cross-calendar sync (Google, iOS, Microsoft).
Integrated **live timers** with **Dynamic Island and Android lock screen** — providing real-time activity tracking.
Developed an **AI-powered assistant** using FastAPI + Google Agent Development Kit to help users manage their goals via chat.
Integrated Firebase Auth, Firestore, Storage, Analytics, and Google OAuth 2.0 for secure, data-driven functionality.

title: Crooze – Fitness Challenge App
details: Developed a community-driven **fitness challenge app** where users participate in walking, cycling, and club challenges to win rewards and certificates.
Enhanced stability by fixing crash loops, null-handling, and data sync issues.
Implemented new modules like **Community Challenges**, **Leaderboard System**, and **Challenge Summary Views**.
Optimized API calls using GraphQL for efficient, high-performance data retrieval.

title: AgreEasy – B2B Agriculture Platform
details: Contributed to AgreEasy, a **B2B app connecting farmers with hotels and restaurants** for direct crop and produce trading.
Built and optimized modules like **Farmer Authentication**, **Profile Management**, and **Land Registration**.
Added **localization** for multilingual support, making the app more inclusive for regional farmers.
Resolved notification bugs, optimized the issue reporting system, and eliminated memory leaks for smoother state handling.

title: SimbaCourse Mobile App
details: Developed a complete **education management system** for SimbaQuartz, connecting admins, teachers, and students.
Handled both **frontend and backend** development from scratch using Flutter (for mobile) and Express.js (for backend).
Enabled course creation, progress tracking, and communication across users.
